analyzed: vuttam ha etam bhagavatā vuttam arahatā iti me suta

original: “Tayome, bhikkhave, akusalavitakkā andhakaraṇā acakkhukaraṇā aññāṇakaraṇā paññānirodhikā vighātapakkhikā anibbānasaṁvattanikā.
analyzed: tayo me bhikkhave akusala vitakkāḥ andha karaṇā a cakkhu karaṇā aññāṇa karaṇā paññā nirodhikā vighāta pakkhikā anibbāna savattanikā

original: Kāmavitakko, bhikkhave, andhakaraṇo acakkhukaraṇo aññāṇakaraṇo paññānirodhiko vighātapakkhiko anibbānasaṁvattaniko.
analyzed: kāma vitakkaḥ bhikkhave andha karaṇaḥ a cakkhu karaṇaḥ aññāṇa karaṇaḥ paññā nirodhikaḥ vighāta pakkhikaḥ anibbāna savattanikaḥ

original: Byāpādavitakko, bhikkhave, andhakaraṇo acakkhukaraṇo aññāṇakaraṇo paññānirodhiko vighātapakkhiko anibbānasaṁvattaniko.
analyzed: byāpāda vitakkaḥ bhikkhave andha karaṇaḥ a cakkhu karaṇaḥ aññāṇa karaṇaḥ paññā nirodhikaḥ vighāta pakkhikaḥ anibbāna savattanikaḥ

original: Vihiṁsāvitakko, bhikkhave, andhakaraṇo acakkhukaraṇo aññāṇakaraṇo paññānirodhiko vighātapakkhiko anibbānasaṁvattaniko.
analyzed: vihisā vitakkaḥ bhikkhave andha karaṇaḥ a cakkhu karaṇaḥ aññāṇa karaṇaḥ paññā nirodhikaḥ vighāta pakkhikaḥ anibbāna savattanikaḥ

original: Ime kho, bhikkhave, tayo akusalavitakkā andhakaraṇā acakkhukaraṇā aññāṇakaraṇā paññānirodhikā vighātapakkhikā anibbānasaṁvattanikā.
analyzed: ime kho bhikkhave tayo akusala vitakkā andha karaṇā a cakkhu karaṇā aññāṇa karaṇā paññā nirodhikā vighāta pakkhikā anibbāna savattanikā

original: Tayome, bhikkhave, kusalavitakkā anandhakaraṇā cakkhukaraṇā ñāṇakaraṇā paññāvuddhikā avighātapakkhikā nibbānasaṁvattanikā.
analyzed: tayo me bhikkhave kusala vitakkā anandha karaṇā cakkhu karaṇā ñāṇa karaṇā paññā vuddhikā avighāta pakkhikā nibbāna savattanikā

original: Nekkhammavitakko, bhikkhave, anandhakaraṇo cakkhukaraṇo ñāṇakaraṇo paññāvuddhiko avighātapakkhiko nibbānasaṁvattaniko.
analyzed: nekkhamma vitakkaḥ bhikkhave an andha karaṇaḥ cakkhu karaṇaḥ ñāṇa karaṇaḥ paññā vuddhikaḥ avighāta pakkhikaḥ nibbāna savattanikaḥ

original: Abyāpādavitakko, bhikkhave, anandhakaraṇo cakkhukaraṇo ñāṇakaraṇo paññāvuddhiko avighātapakkhiko nibbānasaṁvattaniko.
analyzed: a byāpāda vitakkaḥ bhikkhave an andha karaṇaḥ cakkhu karaṇaḥ ñāṇa karaṇaḥ paññā vuddhikaḥ a vighāta pakkhikaḥ nibbāna savattanikaḥ

original: Avihiṁsāvitakko, bhikkhave, anandhakaraṇo cakkhukaraṇo ñāṇakaraṇo paññāvuddhiko avighātapakkhiko nibbānasaṁvattaniko.
analyzed: a vihisā vitakkaḥ bhikkhave an andha karaṇaḥ cakkhu karaṇaḥ ñāṇa karaṇaḥ paññā vuddhikaḥ a vighāta pakkhikaḥ nibbāna savattanikaḥ

original: Ime kho, bhikkhave, tayo kusalavitakkā anandhakaraṇā cakkhukaraṇā ñāṇakaraṇā paññāvuddhikā avighātapakkhikā nibbānasaṁvattanikā”ti.
analyzed: ime kho bhikkhave tayo kusala vitakkā anandha karaṇā cakkhu karaṇā ñāṇa karaṇā paññā vuddhikā avighāta pakkhikā nibbāna savattanikā ati

original: Ayampi attho vutto bhagavatā, iti me sutanti.
analyzed: ayam pi atthaḥ vuttaḥ bhagavatā iti me sutam ti
